tool_description: Get TED talks based on multiple different parameters and filtering options, from the speaker, topic, talk duration, and more.
name: TED Talks API
title: TED Talks API

api_list.name: getSubtitleLanguages
api_list.description: Get all the TED talks subtitle languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ted-talks-api.p.rapidapi.com/subtitle_languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ted-talks-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://ted-talks-api.p.rapidapi.com/subtitle_languages"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ted-talks-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getTalks
api_list.description: Get info about specific talks based on the provided parameters

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: ID of a desired specific talk

optional_parameters.name: audio_lang
optional_parameters.description: Return talks which their audio language is the provided language, the provided value should be the language slug according to the /audio_languages endpoint

optional_parameters.name: speaker
optional_parameters.description: Return talks which at least on of their speakers is the provided speaker, the provided value should be the speaker slug according to the /speakers endpoint

optional_parameters.name: publish_date
optional_parameters.description: Return talks which were published on TED.com only on the exact provided date

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description: Return talks which at least on of their topics is the provided topics, the provided value should be the speaker slug according to the /topics endpoint

optional_parameters.name: subtitle_lang
optional_parameters.description: Return talks which have subtitles in the provided language, the provided value should be the language slug according to the /subtitle_languages endpoint

optional_parameters.name: max_duration
optional_parameters.description: Return talks which their duration in seconds is at most the provided value

optional_parameters.name: to_publish_date
optional_parameters.description: Return talks which were published on TED.com only before the provided date

optional_parameters.name: from_publish_date
optional_parameters.description: Return talks which were published on TED.com only after the provided date

optional_parameters.name: min_duration
optional_parameters.description: Return talks which their duration in seconds is at least the provided value

optional_parameters.name: record_date
optional_parameters.description: Return talks which were recorded only in the exact provided date

optional_parameters.name: to_record_date
optional_parameters.description: Return talks which were recorded only before the provided date

optional_parameters.name: from_record_date
optional_parameters.description: Return talks which were recorded only after the provided date

api_list.name: getTopics
api_list.description: Get all the TED talks topics
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ted-talks-api.p.rapidapi.com/topics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ted-talks-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
